title: Russia Further Restricts Telegram, Escalating Internet Clampdown
summary_full: The throttling of the communication app, used by more than 100 million Russians, endangers what remains of the country’s free internet.
summary_public: The throttling of the communication app, used by more than 100 million Russians, endangers what remains of the country’s free internet.
